alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 10:32AM CST until January 03 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CST FOR ITAWAMBA...SOUTHEASTERN LEE...NORTHERN MONROE...SOUTH CENTRAL TISHOMINGO AND SOUTHEASTERN PRENTISS COUNTIES... At 1032 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Belmont to near Tremont to near New Salem, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Amory, Fulton, Belmont, Shannon, Mantachie, Smithville, Tremont, Fairview, New Salem, Sandy Springs, Evergreen, Clay, Nettleton, Golden, Abney, Eastman, Turon, Ballardsville, Cardsville and Tilden. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
